name: Advanced Data Protection Systems
tag_list: data-protection, backup, data-archive, deduplication, system-recovery, data-restore-r
overview:
Advanced Data Protection Systems (ADPS) is a Value Add Reseller of local, cloud and hybrid data protection, archiving and disaster recovery solutions.

ADPS helps its customers decide which data protection solution is best for them given their particular environment, needs and budget.

At ADPS, organizations can purchase data protection software and install it themselves or they can contract ADPS to perform the professional services installation for them. ADPS also provides free backup environment assessments for organizations trying to get a handle on their data protection needs.

products.name: CommVault Simpana 9 - Data Management Software Solution
Acronis - System Imaging / Data Backup and Disaster Recovery software
